javadoc: The GroupPath is a class to represent a unique path in a tree for a Group.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new GroupPath that is only a single level.
@param groupName name of group
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new GroupPath that is only a single level.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new GroupPath with the given names.

params.name: groupNames
params.comment:
group names. The first name is the oldest ancestor
 and the last name is the youngest descendant in the path.

methods.name: updateGroupPath
methods.comment: Update this group path with the new group name wherever the old group name is found.

methods.javadoc:
Get the last name in the path.
@return String
methods.name: getLastPathComponent
methods.comment: Get the last name in the path.

methods.name: getGroup
methods.comment: Get the Group for this group path object.

return.comment:
null if there is no group with the name in this
 group path.

methods.javadoc: Get the parent path for this group.
methods.name: getParentPath
methods.comment: Get the parent path for this group.

methods.javadoc: Return the array of names that make up this group's path.
methods.name: getPath
methods.comment: Return the array of names that make up this group's path.

methods.javadoc: Get the number of names (levels) that make up this path.
methods.name: getPathCount
methods.comment: Get the number of names (levels) that make up this path.

methods.javadoc:
Get the name at the given index into this group's path.
@param index the index in the group path
methods.name: getPathComponent
methods.comment: Get the name at the given index into this group's path.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index in the group path

methods.javadoc:
Return true if the indicated group path is a descendent of this group path.
@param grpPath the group path
methods.name: isDescendant
methods.comment: Return true if the indicated group path is a descendent of this group path.

methods.name: pathByAddingChild
methods.comment:
Create a new GroupPath object by adding the given
 child name to this group path.

params.name: child
params.comment: name of child to add to path

methods.javadoc: Returns a string representation of this group path.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a string representation of this group path.

name: GroupPath
comment: The GroupPath is a class to represent a unique path in a tree for a Group.
